'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [landmass](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A natural reef boasting several major islands, creating a barrier stretching from the [Karatapu Channel](/karatapuChannel/) down to the eastern side of [Maje Island](/majeIsland/).

## Locations

###### Eastern island:

[75px](/fileIconCliffsTropicalPng/)
:::'''[Tāhae](/tahae/)''' is found on the island itself, for a [bounty](/bountyTahae/).<br clear="left" />
[75px](/fileIconReefPng/)
:::'''Teotara Marvel''': A beautiful, ancient [adra](/adra/) formation in the center of the lagoon. You can express a variety of opinions, but visiting the location gants experience as well as sailor ranks. Only available if you have more than 4 crew members.<br clear="left" />

###### Western island:

[75px](/fileIconCliffsPng/)
:::'''[Pūrākau](/purakau/)''': Another bounty.<br clear="left" />
[75px](/fileIconReefPng/)
:::'''Fanged Strait''': A narrow passage through the reef. You can cross the strait to create a shortcut to the eastern island, but it requires an expert Helmsman.

==Background==
A natural reef boasting several major islands, creating a barrier stretching from the [[Karatapu Channel]] down to the eastern side of [[Maje Island]].

==Locations==
;Eastern island:
[[File:Icon Cliffs Tropical.png|75px|left]]
:::'''[[Tāhae]]''' is found on the island itself, for a [[Bounty - Tāhae|bounty]].<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Reef.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Teotara Marvel''': A beautiful, ancient [[adra]] formation in the center of the lagoon. You can express a variety of opinions, but visiting the location gants experience as well as sailor ranks. Only available if you have more than 4 crew members.<br clear="left" />

;Western island:
[[File:Icon Cliffs.png|75px|left]]
:::'''[[Pūrākau]]''': Another bounty.<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Reef.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Fanged Strait''': A narrow passage through the reef. You can cross the strait to create a shortcut to the eastern island, but it requires an expert Helmsman.
